com.qtfx.library.gui

Class Alert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.library.gui.Alert

  • public class Alert
extends java.lang.Object
    An alert dialog that supports the standard PLAIN, INFORMATION, WARNING, CONFIRMATION and ERROR configurations, with some predefined options. The image is laid out in the left and the content is a text flow pane.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
